TextBody:
Hi Geethika,

Thank you for reaching out to Netwrix support.

Are you moving those files to another server or within a server?

Was it working before with the Chinese characters in files?

What are your language settings on StealthAUDIT server?

I will reassign this ticket to a support engineer from your region.

Best regards,

Aleksandr Timofeev
Technical Support Engineer EMEA

TextBody:
Hello Geethika, 

The current ticket was re-assigned to me. I can see that the version of StealthAUDIT is set to 11.0. Please clarify a build number.

You can execute the following PowerShell script on the StealthAUDIT console server to check the build number:

#Netwrix/Stealth, PostgreSQL, Python application versions:
Get-CimInstance -Class Win32_Product |
Where-Object {($_.Name -Like "Stealth*" -or $_.Name -like "Netwrix*" -or $_.Name -like "*Postg*" -or ` $_.Name -like "Python*")} -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue |
Sort-Object | Format-Table Name,Version,InstallDate -AutoSize

As I can see from the bug fix document - there was an enhancement that can be related to the issue. 


Thank you!

Best Regards,
Ilia Kudashev
Support Engineer EMEA
